publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-821.1 Mr Brian Monteith: Local Government Finance (Scotland) Order 2004-As an amendment to motion (S2M-821) in the name of Mr Andy Kerr, insert at end "but, in doing so, considers that any consequential funding under the Barnett Formula accruing to Scotland as a result of an increase in the grant given to English and Welsh local authorities will be allocated to the Scottish Local Authorities' Revenue Support Grant."
